review: Overall, very pleased with the Fire TV unit. Fairly easy to hook up. Would be helpful if the navigation ring had arrows. Some negatives, when trying to register some of the apps, Comcast is not listed as a provider choice. Also, have not been able to get the mirroring to work. Have ordered the gaming unit, but is a long wait.
